categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Kolaador Base, also known as the Pilot Training Center (PTC), was a facility on Kolaador used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic to train starfighter pilots during the Galactic Civil War.

It was at this base that Rookie One completed his training under Commander Ru Murleen in 0 BBY. However their rest was cut short; when the Devastator attacked Tantive IV, the two pilots were alerted from the Anchorhead Base and left the planet for Tatooine.
Three years later, Rookie One would visit again the same bar.
